title: Famine

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night to speed up their starvation by one day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The night after you transform, all players without bread will be dealt an Unstoppable Attack.
- Players with bread will live an additional three days before dying of starvation.
- You are immune to roleblocks and controls.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone that would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3870b
*Unfortunately I can't let this one spawn naturally because... yeah.*
